description: Detect use of the Windows 8.3 short name. Which could be used as a method to avoid command-line detection
false_positives: Applications could use this notation occasionally which might generate some false positives. In that case Investigate the parent and child process.
name: Use NTFS Short Name in Command Line
query: (process.command_line.text:(*\~1.exe* OR *\~1.bat* OR *\~1.msi* OR *\~1.vbe* OR *\~1.vbs* OR *\~1.dll* OR *\~1.ps1* OR *\~1.js* OR *\~1.hta* OR *\~2.exe* OR *\~2.bat* OR *\~2.msi* OR *\~2.vbe* OR *\~2.vbs* OR *\~2.dll* OR *\~2.ps1* OR *\~2.js* OR *\~2.hta*) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable.text:*\\WebEx\\WebexHost.exe)))
author: frack113
